amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to operate or maintain more than 300 land-based intercontinental ballistic missiles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 136 - 283 (Roll no. 482).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 136 - 283 (Roll no. 482).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Markey.
